tool_description: Search places and amenties by category and location
name: Places by category
title: Places by category

api_list.name: Places by type
api_list.description: Find places by category and location (bounding box or area). Returns name, location, address and other information.

optional_parameters.name: lat1
optional_parameters.description: Latitude of top-left bounding box coordinate (lat1,lon1,lat2,lon2 should be provided together)

optional_parameters.name: lon2
optional_parameters.description: Longitude of bottom-right bounding box coordinate (lat1,lon1,lat2,lon2 should be provided together)

optional_parameters.name: geometryId
optional_parameters.description: Alternative filter by free-form geometry (e.g reachability isoline)

optional_parameters.name: lon1
optional_parameters.description: Longitude of top-left bounding box coordinate (lat1,lon1,lat2,lon2 should be provided together)

optional_parameters.name: lat2
optional_parameters.description: Latitude of bottom-right bounding box coordinate (lat1,lon1,lat2,lon2 should be provided together)
